area_1_arm.description: Send a request to Olarm to arm area 1 on your alarm.

area_1_sleep.description: Send a request to Olarm to set area 1 to sleep on your alarm.

area_1_stay.description: Send a request to Olarm to set area 1 to stay on your alarm.

area_1_disarm.description: Send a request to Olarm to disarm area 1 of your alarm.

area_2_arm.description: Send a request to Olarm to arm area 2 on your alarm.

area_2_sleep.description: Send a request to Olarm to set area 2 to sleep on your alarm.

area_2_stay.description: Send a request to Olarm to set area 2 to stay on your alarm.

area_2_disarm.description: Send a request to Olarm to disarm area 2 of your alarm.

bypass_zone.description: Send a request to Olarm to bypass the zone on your alarm.
